group_1.textLeft: While I'm curious about that voice...
I don't think it'll give us any more clues@about that shipwreck.

group_1.textRight: It doesn't look like we've caused any@disturbances to this monument.
We might as well try looking@someplace else.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, I wanna know what's up with@Mitama's group.

group_1.textRight: Me too!
We had quite the bounty over here!
[chara:101701:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Voila! A box and an old bangle!

group_1.textLeft: Wow... Looks like you struck gold!

group_1.textRight: It seems like no one has ever found this@before.
We decided we'd have Yuta take a look@at it first.

group_1.textLeft: Yes! I'll take care of this!

group_1.textRight: We didn't find anything on our end...

group_1.textLeft: Just a bit of shoulder pain...

group_1.textRight: Could that bangle have a clue to the@sunken ship?

group_1.textLeft: No...probably not.
We heard a voice when we touched@that bangle...
It didn't mention anything about the ship,@though.

group_1.textRight: Hey, did that voice happen to say,@"I'll be waiting for you"?

group_1.textLeft: Oh my, how did you know?
We heard just the same thing when@we touched the monument!
I knew we weren't just imaginin' things...

group_1.textRight: But...we can't determine where the shipwreck@is with that voice alone.

group_1.textLeft: Yuta, do you have any other ideas?

group_1.textRight: I'm sorry...but I've got nothing else.
Hmm...

group_1.textLeft: If we could narrow down the location,@we could take it from there...
Oh...I've got it!
Let's use that bangle!

group_1.textRight: What do you mean?

group_1.textLeft: We'll pretend it washed up on the beach@and say we found it there.

group_1.textRight: Wh...what?! You mean you're going to lie?!
We can't do that!

group_1.textLeft: I know it's wrong...
But we can't squander this opportunity.
If people realize there are still ships on@the seafloor from way back when,
maybe it'll prompt an investigation,@don't you think?

group_1.textRight: I know it'll be difficult to pull off...
But I think it's better than nothing.

group_1.textLeft: Coordinator...!

group_1.textRight: If we can't find that shipwreck on our own,
we have no choice but to rely on others.
But is it truly okay to lie to them...?

group_1.textLeft: Well, if they find out, they're gonna be mighty@pissed. We have to brace ourselves...
But either way, if people can see that we,@as well as Miyo,
are serious about changing the custom,
then I'm sure the elder will understand.
